DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect high voltage pulse current low level laser therapy heal process diabetic foot ulcer .
DOC.brief_title: Effects High Voltage Pulsed Current ( HVPC ) Low Level Laser Therapy ( LLLT ) Wound Healing Diabetic Ulcers
DOC.detailed_description: Based literature review conclude LLLT HVPC effective healing wound . We meet outcomes previous clinical study , compare effectivity two physical technology . For high prevalence diabetic foot ulcer , amputation risk consequent impairment dysfunction quality life , associate high cost health problem , important new study identify effective treatment alternative promote wound closure .
